selected_quotes: Automated customer service, how do we loathe thee? Our scholars count the ways. #LetMeTalkToAPerson
Ever been to #voicemailjail? You're not alone, and yes, we all hate automated #customerservice too.
Jacob Groshek, Chelsea Cutino, Jill Walsh discuss customer service, phone menus, distrust of virtual assistants

citation.abstract: Phone trees drive you mad? Just want to talk to an actual person? You aren't alone – despite the fact that most customer service journeys begin with automated interactive voice response systems.
citation.title: Customer service on hold: we hate phone menus and don’t trust virtual assistants like Siri
